body_html:
This is actually working as intended:
https://www.tensorflow.org/install/gpu#linux_setup

export command does not update your LD_LIBRARY_PATH permanently. It only updates it for a session.
It is easy to find ways to permanently update your LD_LIBRARY_PATH.

Here is one of the first results that come up in google when I search for "cuda LD_LIBRARY_PATH"
https://devtalk.nvidia.com/default/topic/995815/path-amp-ld_library_path/

body:
This is actually working as intended:
https://www.tensorflow.org/install/gpu#linux_setup

export command does not update your LD_LIBRARY_PATH permanently. It only updates it for a session.
It is easy to find ways to permanently update your LD_LIBRARY_PATH.

Here is one of the first results that come up in google when I search for "cuda LD_LIBRARY_PATH"
https://devtalk.nvidia.com/default/topic/995815/path-amp-ld_library_path/
